content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the number of steps in the route is doubled, the distance from the starting point to the endpoint should also be doubled.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find an otter. Moving in a clockwise direction from the otter, the elements on the path are a tile roof, a kite, a trolleybus, a holster, a banjo, a lighter, a Siamese cat, a baboon, a red panda, a dishwasher, a chain-link fence, a ground beetle, a tripod, a damselfly, a burrito, a refrigerator, a trilobite, a face powder, and a miniskirt. Starting from the tile roof, you move around the ring by 3 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 7 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 11 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 9 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

Starting from the tile roof, you move around the ring by 6 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 14 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 22 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 18 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?
